ruleArticles:
<js>
sort = [];
L = String(baseUrl).replace(/^h[^=]*\=/,'').split('★');
for (i = 0; i < L.length; ++i) {
  K = (x) => {
    r = L[i].split('☆')[x];
    return r ==null ? "": r;
  };
  sort.push ({
    title: K(1),
    date: K(2),
    img: K(3),
    link: K(0)
  });
};
JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>
$.[*]

ruleArticles:
<js>
  json=[];
  if(baseUrl.match(/★/)){
  list=baseUrl.replace(/http.*?wd=\s*/,'').split('★');
  for(i in list){
  href=list[i].match(/【(.*?)】/)[1];
  text=list[i].match(/《(.*?)》/)[1];
  intro=list[i].match(/◎(.*?)◎/)[1];
  indexUrl=list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)?list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)[1]:list[i].match(/^(.*?)【/)[1]
   if(indexUrl.indexOf('https://xiang-shiwang.gitee.io')!=-1 || indexUrl.indexOf('http://xiang-shiwang.gitee.io')!=-1  || indexUrl.indexOf('http://jnztgtjy.usa3.345888.xyz/rss/fb.php')!=-1 || indexUrl.indexOf('https://jnztgtjy.usa3.345888.xyz/rss/fb.php')!=-1 ){
       if(indexUrl.indexOf('?')==-1){
           indexUrl+='?v='+new Date().getTime()
       }else{
            indexUrl+='?&='+new Date().getTime()
       }
   } json.push({text:text,src:href,intro:intro,index:indexUrl})
  }
  }
  JSON.stringify(json)
  </js>
  $.[*]
